markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Umbral Wings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1719)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This hooded cloak is soft and surprisingly durable. Its cloth is a purple so deep as to be almost black, woven with dark blue and purple shapes suggesting wings of nocturnal creatures. While wearing the cloak, you gain low-light vision and a +1 item bonus to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-1284" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Umbral Wings
